GetAllCondensed: SELECT * FROM ActiveLineItems_ReconciledPriorMonths_Condensed UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ActiveLineItems_ReconciledCurrentMonth UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ActiveLineItems_PendingGoal ORDER BY Year DESC, MonthId DESC, DayOfMonth DESC
UpdateRow: UPDATE factLineItem fli SET fli.MonthId = ?, fli.DayOfMonth = ?, fli.DayOfWeekId = ?, fli.Year = ?, fli.SubcategoryKey = ?, fli.Description = ?, fli.Amount = ?, fli.TypeId = ?, fli.SubtypeId = ?, fli.Quarter = ?, fli.PaymentMethodKey = ?, fli.StatusId = ?, fli.LastUpdatedDate = NOW() WHERE fli.UniqueKey = ?
InsertRow: INSERT INTO factLineItem (UniqueKey, MonthId, DayOfMonth, DayOfWeekId, Year, SubcategoryKey, Description, Amount, TypeId, SubtypeId, Quarter, PaymentMethodKey, StatusId, LastUpdatedDate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, NOW())
